diddle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to get money from someone by deceiving them
diddle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: They’ll diddle you out of your last penny if you let them.
diddle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to get money from someone by deceiving them
diddle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: I’m sure he diddled me out of quite a lot of money!
